\section{功能说明}
\label{\detokenize{jsapi:id2}}
本文档提供钱包的DAPP访问接口说明。Andriod/IOS通用版本。

\label{\detokenize{jsapi:native}}

\subsection{1.native.getVersionCode}
\label{\detokenize{jsapi:native-getversioncode}}

\end{sphinxVerbatim}
\begin{itemize}
\item {}

\end{itemize}

\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]

　data.versionCode
\PYGZcb{}
\end{sphinxVerbatim}

\subsection{3.native.openUrl}
\label{\detokenize{jsapi:native-openurl}}
通过此方法在 bcb wallet 钱包中打开一个新的 webview页面
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
调用方式

\end{itemize}

\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
bcbwallet(\PYGZsq{}native.openUrl\PYGZsq{}, params, null);
\end{sphinxVerbatim}
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
params

\end{itemize}

\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYGZob{}
  \PYGZdq{}url\PYGZdq{}:\PYGZdq{}https://www.baidu.com\PYGZdq{}, //链接地址
  \PYGZdq{}title\PYGZdq{}:\PYGZdq{}百度\PYGZdq{}, //页面标题
  \PYGZdq{}showTitle\PYGZdq{}:true  //true为显示app 导航栏并显示title，false则隐藏app 导航栏
\PYGZcb{}
\end{sphinxVerbatim}
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
代码示例

\end{itemize}

\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{n}{bcbwallet}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{l+s+s1}{\PYGZsq{}}\PYG{l+s+s1}{native.openUrl}\PYG{l+s+s1}{\PYGZsq{}}\PYG{p}{,} \PYG{p}{\PYGZob{}}
    \PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{l+s+s2}{url}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{p}{:}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{l+s+s2}{https://www.baidu.com}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{p}{,}
    \PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{l+s+s2}{title}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{p}{:}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{l+s+s2}{百度}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{p}{,}
    \PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{l+s+s2}{showTitle}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{p}{:}\PYG{n}{true}
\PYG{p}{\PYGZcb{}}\PYG{p}{,} \PYG{n}{null}\PYG{p}{)}\PYG{p}{;}
\end{sphinxVerbatim}

\subsection{5.native.scanQRCode}
\label{\detokenize{jsapi:native-scanqrcode}}

\end{itemize}

\end{sphinxVerbatim}

\item {}

\end{itemize}

\PYGZcb{}

\subsection{6.native.screenChange}
\label{\detokenize{jsapi:native-screenchange}}
调用此方法,可以设置不同的参数强制bcb wallet 钱包进行横竖屏或全屏操作
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
调用方式

\end{itemize}

\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
bcbwallet(\PYGZsq{}native.screenChange\PYGZsq{}, params, null);
\end{sphinxVerbatim}
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
params

\end{itemize}

\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYGZob{}
  \PYGZdq{}landType\PYGZdq{}:1, //横竖屏 1：横屏，2：竖屏
  \PYGZdq{}fullType\PYGZdq{}:1, //是否全屏显示 1：全屏，2：退出全屏
\PYGZcb{}
\end{sphinxVerbatim}
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
代码示例

\end{itemize}

\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{n}{bcbwallet}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{l+s+s1}{\PYGZsq{}}\PYG{l+s+s1}{native.screenChange}\PYG{l+s+s1}{\PYGZsq{}}\PYG{p}{,} \PYG{p}{\PYGZob{}}
    \PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{l+s+s2}{landType}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{p}{:}\PYG{l+m+mi}{1}\PYG{p}{,}
    \PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{l+s+s2}{fullType}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{p}{:}\PYG{l+m+mi}{1}
\PYG{p}{\PYGZcb{}}\PYG{p}{,} \PYG{n}{null}\PYG{p}{)}\PYG{p}{;}
\end{sphinxVerbatim}


\section{BCB}
\label{\detokenize{jsapi:bcb}}

\subsection{1.bcb.getWalletsInfo}
\label{\detokenize{jsapi:bcb-getwalletsinfo}}
调用此方法可以获取当前bcb wallet
钱包的所有钱包信息列表(钱包名称和钱包地址)
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
调用方式

\end{itemize}

\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
bcbwallet(\PYGZsq{}bcb.getWalletsInfo\PYGZsq{}, null, callback);
\end{sphinxVerbatim}
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
callback

\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
function(data) \PYGZob{}
　data.walletsInfo //所有钱包地址信息
\PYGZcb{}
****返回钱包列表信息****
walletsInfo:[
  \PYGZob{}
      \PYGZdq{}name\PYGZdq{}:\PYGZdq{}myWallet\PYGZdq{},
      \PYGZdq{}walletAddr\PYGZdq{}:\PYGZdq{}bcbPDTi68XwoMgGTwxd7ioZeMHHz7p7ewLtQ\PYGZdq{}
  \PYGZcb{},
  \PYGZob{}
      \PYGZdq{}name\PYGZdq{}:\PYGZdq{}newWallet\PYGZdq{},
        \PYGZdq{}walletAddr\PYGZdq{}:\PYGZdq{}bcbCUh7Zsb7PBgLwHJVok2QaMhbW64HNK4FU\PYGZdq{}
  \PYGZcb{}
]
\end{sphinxVerbatim}

\item {} 
代码示例

\end{itemize}

\subsection{3.bcb.commonPayUrl}
\label{\detokenize{jsapi:bcb-commonpayurl}}
调用此方法可以打开 bcb wallet
钱包显示当前支付信息,信息校验正确后可以进行支付操作,支付完成后返回支付的状态
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
调用方式

\end{itemize}

\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
bcbwallet(\PYGZsq{}bcb.commonPayUrl\PYGZsq{}, params, callback);
\end{sphinxVerbatim}
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
params

\end{itemize}

\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{p}{\PYGZob{}}
    \PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{l+s+s2}{payUrl}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{p}{:}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{l+s+s2}{http://172.18.20.156:8080/bcbtest/test2.txt}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}} \PYG{o}{/}\PYG{o}{/}\PYG{n}{支付订单链接}
\PYG{p}{\PYGZcb{}}
\end{sphinxVerbatim}
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
callback

\end{itemize}

\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
function(data) \PYGZob{}
  data.code, //0为支付成功
      data.message
\PYGZcb{}
\end{sphinxVerbatim}
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
代码示例

\end{itemize}

\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]

\subsection{4.bcb.commonPayParams}
\label{\detokenize{jsapi:bcb-commonpayparams}}
调用此方法可以打开 bcb wallet
钱包显示当前支付信息,信息校验正确后可以进行支付操作,支付完成后返回支付的状态
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
调用方式

\end{itemize}

\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
bcbwallet(\PYGZsq{}bcb.commonPayParams\PYGZsq{}, params, callback);
\end{sphinxVerbatim}
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
params

\section{1.支付协议}
\label{\detokenize{bcbwallet protocol:id2}}
\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{n}{bcbwallet}\PYG{p}{:}\PYG{o}{/}\PYG{o}{/}\PYG{n}{req\PYGZus{}pay}\PYG{o}{=}\PYG{n}{支付链接}
\end{sphinxVerbatim}

协议说明:通过此协议拉起 bcbwallet 的支付功能,并把支付hash 返回.

示例代码:

\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{n+nx}{url} \PYG{o}{=} \PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}bcbwallet://req\PYGZus{}pay=https://testclt.cgs.cool/yeb/h5/bcb/investment/transfer/jcsd0IB7g444P9UyhyXsggqHfDOtuK6A\PYGZdq{}}
\PYG{n+nx}{jsbridge}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{n+nx}{url}\PYG{p}{)}\PYG{p}{;}
\PYG{n+nb}{window}\PYG{p}{.}\PYG{n+nx}{inform} \PYG{o}{=} \PYG{k+kd}{function}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{n+nx}{d}\PYG{p}{)} \PYG{p}{\PYGZob{}}
    \PYG{k}{if}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{n+nx}{d}\PYG{p}{.}\PYG{n+nx}{txHash}\PYG{p}{)} \PYG{p}{\PYGZob{}}
      \PYG{n+nx}{console}\PYG{p}{.}\PYG{n+nx}{log}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{n+nx}{d}\PYG{p}{.}\PYG{n+nx}{txHash}\PYG{p}{)}\PYG{p}{;}
     \PYG{p}{\PYGZcb{}} \PYG{k}{else} \PYG{p}{\PYGZob{}}
      \PYG{n+nx}{console}\PYG{p}{.}\PYG{n+nx}{log}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}fail\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{p}{)}\PYG{p}{;}
     \PYG{p}{\PYGZcb{}}
   \PYG{p}{\PYGZcb{}}
\end{sphinxVerbatim}

返回结果:

支付完成后, 如果存在txHash, 可根据 txHash
值查询支付详情,否则视为支付失败.


\section{2.授权认证协议}
\label{\detokenize{bcbwallet protocol:id3}}
\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{n}{bcbwallet}\PYG{p}{:}\PYG{o}{/}\PYG{o}{/}\PYG{n}{req\PYGZus{}auth}\PYG{o}{=}\PYG{n}{授权链接}
\end{sphinxVerbatim}

协议说明:通过此协议唤起bcbwallet 的授权功能.

示例代码:

\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
 \PYG{n+nx}{url} \PYG{o}{=} \PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}bcbwallet://req\PYGZus{}auth=https://clt.cgs.cool/otc/callback/token/nE74Lya9Oa4Z6H1a6hvPL9ntOiv2ot1v\PYGZdq{}}
\PYG{n+nx}{jsbridge}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{n+nx}{url}\PYG{p}{)}\PYG{p}{;}
\end{sphinxVerbatim}


\section{3.获取钱包列表}
\label{\detokenize{bcbwallet protocol:id4}}
\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{n}{bcbwallet}\PYG{p}{:}\PYG{o}{/}\PYG{o}{/}\PYG{n}{req\PYGZus{}info}\PYG{o}{=}\PYG{n}{bcbinforeq}
\end{sphinxVerbatim}

协议说明:通过此协议获取 bcbwallet 所有的钱包地址的 json 字符串.

示例代码:

\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{n+nx}{jsbridge}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}bcbwallet://req\PYGZus{}info=bcbinforeq\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{p}{)}\PYG{p}{;}
\PYG{n+nb}{window}\PYG{p}{.}\PYG{n+nx}{inform} \PYG{o}{=} \PYG{k+kd}{function}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{n+nx}{walletsJson}\PYG{p}{)} \PYG{p}{\PYGZob{}}
    \PYG{n+nx}{console}\PYG{p}{.}\PYG{n+nx}{log}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{n+nx}{walletsJson}\PYG{p}{)}\PYG{p}{;}
   \PYG{p}{\PYGZcb{}}
\end{sphinxVerbatim}

返回结果:

返回钱包列表的 json 字符串.


\section{4.打开普通 web页面}
\label{\detokenize{bcbwallet protocol:web}}
\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{n}{bcbwallet}\PYG{p}{:}\PYG{o}{/}\PYG{o}{/}\PYG{n}{req\PYGZus{}web}\PYG{o}{=}\PYG{n}{h5链接}
\end{sphinxVerbatim}

协议说明:通过此协议在 bcbwallet 钱包内部打开链接页面

示例代码:

\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{n+nx}{jsbridge}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}bcbwallet://req\PYGZus{}web=https://www.bcbscan.io\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{p}{)}\PYG{p}{;}
\end{sphinxVerbatim}


\section{5.启动扫码功能}
\label{\detokenize{bcbwallet protocol:id5}}
\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{n}{bcbwallet}\PYG{p}{:}\PYG{o}{/}\PYG{o}{/}\PYG{n}{req\PYGZus{}info}\PYG{o}{=}\PYG{n}{qrcode}
\end{sphinxVerbatim}

协议说明:通过此协议唤起 bcbwallet 的二维码扫码功能,并把扫码识别结果返回.

示例代码:

\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{n+nx}{jsbridge}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}bcbwallet://req\PYGZus{}info=qrcode\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{p}{)}\PYG{p}{;}
\PYG{n+nb}{window}\PYG{p}{.}\PYG{n+nx}{inform} \PYG{o}{=} \PYG{k+kd}{function}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{n+nx}{qrCode}\PYG{p}{)} \PYG{p}{\PYGZob{}}
    \PYG{n+nx}{console}\PYG{p}{.}\PYG{n+nx}{log}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{n+nx}{qrCode}\PYG{p}{)}\PYG{p}{;}
   \PYG{p}{\PYGZcb{}}
\end{sphinxVerbatim}

返回结果:返回二维码扫描的识别结果.


\section{6.退出 web页面}
\label{\detokenize{bcbwallet protocol:id6}}
\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{n}{bcbwallet}\PYG{p}{:}\PYG{o}{/}\PYG{o}{/}\PYG{n}{req\PYGZus{}info}\PYG{o}{=}\PYG{n}{exitpage}
\end{sphinxVerbatim}

\section{功能说明}
\label{\detokenize{BCBWalletSDK_u63a5_u53e3_u8bf4_u660e:id2}}
本文档提供钱包的SDK访问接口说明。IOS版本。


\section{接口访问方式}
\label{\detokenize{BCBWalletSDK_u63a5_u53e3_u8bf4_u660e:id3}}
API调用，返回的内容也是一个json串，里面会携带返回的状态
码以及一些返回的必要参数。

&
string
&
是
&
转账的金额，例如”102.23”
\\
\hline
note
&
string
&
否
&
转账的备注，对于BCB链，这个字段最终会写入到区块中
\\
\hline
byb
&
string
&
是
&
是否为BYB转账
\\
\hline
\end{tabulary}
